miniapp.name: Spinning Money
miniapp.description: Spin the wheel and win ETH! Provably fair crypto gaming on Base. Every spin grows the prize pool - the more you play, the bigger the jackpot gets! All spins contribute to the pool and YOU could be the next big winner!
miniapp.subtitle: Provably fair crypto gaming
miniapp.ogDescription: Provably fair crypto gaming on Base. Spin the wheel and win ETH!
